entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 5 near Georgian Bay.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8 except plus 5 near Georgian Bay. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
